---
title: "RNAGEN: A generative adversarial network-based model to generate synthetic RNA sequences to target proteins"
authors: "Ozden, F., Barazandeh, S., Akboga, D., Tabrizi, S.S., Seker, U.O.S., Cicek, A.E."
venue: "bioRxiv"
year: 2023
links:
  - text: Preprint
    href: https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.07.11.548246
---

We developed a GAN-based model for generating synthetic RNA sequences that target specific proteins. The model learns to produce biologically plausible RNA sequences with desired binding properties while maintaining structural validity.
